mapper.sql: review_num, book_num, mem_num, store_num, review_contents, review_date, review_answer_contents, star_rate, review_image, review_store_image
mapper.insert: insert into review () values (#{reviewNum}, #{bookNum}, #{memNum}, #{storeNum}, #{reviewContents}, sysdate, null, #{starRate}, #{reviewImage}, #{reviewStoreImage})
mapper.update: update review set review_answer_contents = #{reviewAnswerContents} where review_num = #{reviewNum}
update review set review_answer_contents = #{reviewAnswerContents}, review_answer_date = sysdate where review_num = #{reviewNum}
mapper.delete: update review set review_answer_contents = null, review_answer_date = null where review_num = #{reviewNum}
